duties_responsibilities.duty: Compile financial data and conduct analyses, reconciliations, and projections to support academic, research, or administrative units.
Determine, develop, and organize data required for assignments.
Perform data entry, calculations, estimates, and reconciliations consistent with assignment parameters.
Prepare reports including charts, graphs, and schedules to effectively present assignment results.
Provide explanations of methodology employed as required.
Remain current on financial reporting requirements, regulations, and processes.
May provide work direction to lower-level financial personnel.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Accounting, Business, Finance, or related field or equivalent combination of education and experience. Master's of Business Administration (MBA) preferred.
